entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Temperature steady near plus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending late this evening then cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Fog patches developing late this evening. Temperature steady near plus 5. Forecast issued 8:19 PM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of rain. Temperature falling to zero in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending near noon then a mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 near noon. Temperature falling to zero in the afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 8:19 PM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming partly cloudy after midnight. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 8:19 PM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023
